posts.post_content:
Looking for the following T206’s with the Sov 460 back.  Any help in tracking them down would be greatly appreciated.  I have added ~ values that I am willing to pay for a decent PSA or SGC 1 example except for McGraw.

Chance Yellow - $1500
Cobb Red - $2000
McGraw No Cap 2-3 - $150-$250

Thanks,

Tom
